        Post an image update to the user interface
        Parameters:
        task - the task associated with the update
        product - a valid render product

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Cancel all running tasks and clear all current status posts.

      • loadModel

        public void loadModel(IModel model)
        Initiate a load task for an instance of a model and, ultimately, queue rendering tasks.
        Parameters:
        model - a valid model

      • loadModel

        public IModel loadModel(File file,
                        String option)
        Instantiate a file-based model and queue a loading task. Ultimately the loading task will queue rendering tasks.
        Parameters:
        file - a valid reference to a readable file in a supported format.
        option - an optional data element based on the file-type
        Returns:
        if the model was successfully initialized, a valid instance; otherwise a null.

      • queueConstraintLoadingTask

        public MvComposite queueReloadTask(IModel model,
                                   ViewOptions vOpt,

      • queueHeavyweightRenderTask

        public MvComposite queueHeavyweightRenderTask(IModel model,
                                              ViewOptions view,
                                              CompositeImageScale ccs)
        Queues a render task; typically invoked from the UI when the user changes view options that require that a new model-view composite be created. Typically, this is due to a change in the visible map-area (a pan or zoom) or in view options that alter the point-selection and require that any existing TINs be rebuilt.
        Parameters:
        model - a fully loaded model
        view - a valid instance
        ccs - specifications for model position and scale for imaging
        Returns:
        a valid instance

      • queueLightweightRenderTask

        public MvComposite queueLightweightRenderTask(MvComposite oldComposite,
                                              ViewOptions view)
        Queues a new rendering task; typically invoked from the UI when the user makes changes to the view options that do not require reconstructing the TINs associated with the image.
        Parameters:
        oldComposite - an existing, model-view composite that contains elements that can be transferred intact for reuse in a new composite (TINs, grids, etc.).
        view - view-related options for rendering
        Returns:
        a valid model-view composite instance.

      • setViewOptions

        public void setViewOptions(ViewOptions view)
        Set the current view options to be used when loading any new models. This method is synchronized to permit communication with background processes.
        Parameters:
        view - a valid instance
